articles.author: Derek Saul, Mary Whitfill Roeloffs
articles.title: DeepSeek Panic Live Updates: Nvidia And Other Chip Stocks Rise In Premarket After Monday’s Rout - Forbes
articles.description: The president spoke Monday afternoon about the new AI model that roiled the U.S. tech industry.
articles.content: The release of a less capital-intensive artificial intelligence model from Chinas DeepSeek sent a chill through the U.S. stock market Monday, initiating a massive selloff led by Nvidia and hitting bi… [+10228 chars]
